attributes.action: Introduce these 100% foolproof policies to bring us back out of the recession and economic growth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As what I've written is too long it's recommended you contact me for more information concerning these 5 points and their reason, they were made to alleviate the hardship faced by the tax payers in the gradual recession

1. Illegalise and restrict massive bank interests to allow the populace to breathe.
2. Re-organise government and council departments to employ well trained and hard working staff.
3. Nationalise all British owned banks by buying out their shares and outcompete commercial interests with a popular % rate and more easily understood mortgage package rates.
4. Build better conditioned houses and rehouse the 180,000+ abandoned homes that already exist and rent out to skilled immigrants and families in dire financial and housing conditions.
5. Increase the timetable for which a resident can buy his or her home from 5 years to 10 years to prevent massive buyouts of reusable tenant homes.

rejection.details: This e-petition is more appropriate for an email: webmaster@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
